channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.description: 【Artificial intelligence is quickly becoming a key part of the modern .NET developer’s toolkit. With GitHub Copilot Chat, you can save countless hours, eliminate friction, and unlock new levels of creativity by simply asking the right questions. But what exactly should you ask? Here are five GitHub Copilot Chat prompts every .NET dev shoul】人工智能正在迅速成为现代.NET开发人员工具包的关键部分。借助Github Copilot聊天，您可以节省无数小时，消除摩擦，并通过简单地提出正确的问题来解锁新的创造力。但是您到底应该问什么？这是五个github副作用聊天提示，每个.NET DEV SHOUL

item.title: 【Introducing MCP Support in AI Shell Preview 6】在AI Shell Preview 6中引入MCP支持6
item.description: 【AI Shell Preview 6 is here! We are super excited to announce the latest preview release of AI Shell. This release focuses on enhancing the user experience with new features, improved error handling, and better integration with Model Context Protocol (MCP) tools. What's new at a glance】AI Shell Preview 6在这里！我们很高兴宣布AI Shell的最新预览版本。该版本的重点是增强用户体验新功能，改进的错误处理以及与模型上下文协议（MCP）工具更好的集成。一目了然

item.title: 【How do I disable pieces of the property sheet for a service in the Services MMC snap-in?】如何禁用属性表的属性表中的服务MMC快照中的服务？
item.description: 【A customer was developing a service, and they didn't want users to be able to change the service's startup type (e.g. change it from auto-start to disabled). They saw that other services had the "Startup type" field disabled. How can they get in on that action? They found that that they could get close to the desired behavior by restricting】客户正在开发服务，他们不希望用户能够更改服务的启动类型（例如，将其从自动启动更改为残疾人）。他们看到其他服务已禁用“启动类型”字段。他们如何参与这一行动？他们发现，他们可以通过限制来接近所需的行为

item.title: 【.NET and .NET Framework August 2025 servicing releases updates】.NET和.NET框架2025年8月Servicating发布更新
item.description: 【Welcome to our combined .NET servicing updates for August 2025. Let's get into the latest release of .NET & .NET Framework, here is a quick overview of what's new in our servicing releases: Security improvements .NET and .NET Framework has been refreshed with the latest update as of August 05, 2025. This update contains non-secu】欢迎使用2025年8月的总和.NET维修更新。让我们进入.NET＆.NET Framework的最新版本，以下是我们维修版本中新事物的快速概述：安全改进。NET和.NET框架，并在2025年8月的2025年8月更新中重新刷新了。

item.title: 【Build a RAG application with LangChain and Local LLMs powered by Ollama】使用Langchain和由Ollama提供动力的Langchain和Local LLMS构建RAG应用程序
item.description: 【Local large language models (LLMs) provide significant advantages for developers and organizations. Key benefits include enhanced data privacy, as sensitive information remains entirely within your own infrastructure, and offline functionality, enabling uninterrupted work even without internet access. While cloud-based LLM services are conveni】当地的大型语言模型（LLM）为开发人员和组织提供了重要的优势。关键好处包括增强的数据隐私，因为敏感信息完全保留在您自己的基础架构中，并且离线功能，即使没有Internet访问，也可以不间断地工作。而基于云的LLM服务便宜

item.title: 【Exploring new Agent Quality and NLP evaluators for .NET AI applications】探索.NET AI应用程序的新代理质量和NLP评估器
item.description: 【When building AI applications, comprehensive evaluation is crucial to ensure your systems deliver accurate, reliable, and contextually appropriate responses. item.title: 【"HTTP header exceeding 8,192 bytes" error when using the Azure SDK for Java】使用Azure SDK时，“ HTTP标头超过8,192个字节”错误
item.description: 【A recent issue was identified in the azure-resourcemanager libraries for Java regarding HTTP headers exceeding 8,192 bytes. Following analysis, this was addressed within the Azure SDK for Java by increasing the maximum response header size limit of “reactor-netty-http】最近在Java的Azure-ResourceManager库中确定了最近的一个问题，内容涉及超过8,192个字节的HTTP标头。在分析之后，通过增加“反应器netty-HTTP
